migrations.description: Split global configuration files into individual project.json files. This migration has been added automatically to the beginning of your migration set to retroactively make them work with the new version of Nx.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Remove root property from project.json files
migrations.name: 14-0-6-remove-root

migrations.description: Add JSON Schema to Nx configuration files
migrations.name: 14-2-0-add-json-schema

migrations.description: Remove default collection from configuration to switch to prompts for collection
migrations.name: 14-2-0-remove-default-collection

migrations.description: Replace all ./ and ../ in outputs with absolute paths
migrations.name: 14-2-0-replace-relative-outputs-with-absolute

migrations.description: Replace targetDependencies with targetDefaults
migrations.name: 14.3.4-create-target-defaults

migrations.description: Replace implicitDependencies with namedInputs + target inputs
migrations.name: 15.0.0-migrate-to-inputs

migrations.description: Prefix outputs with {workspaceRoot}/{projectRoot} if needed
migrations.name: 15.0.0-prefix-outputs

migrations.description: Set project names in project.json files
migrations.name: 15.1.0-set-project-names

migrations.description: Updates the nx wrapper.
migrations.name: 15.8.2-update-nx-wrapper

migrations.description: Explicitly enable sourceAnalysis for all workspaces extending from npm.json or core.json (this was default behavior prior to 14.2)
migrations.name: 14-2-0-enable-source-analysis

migrations.description: Migrates from @nrwl/workspace:run-commands to nx:run-commands
migrations.name: 14-8-0-change-run-commands-executor

migrations.description: Split global configuration files (e.g., workspace.json) into individual project.json files.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files

migrations.description: Update to export default in jest config and revert jest.preset.ts to jest.preset.js
migrations.name: update-to-export-default

migrations.description: Exclude jest.config.ts from tsconfig where missing.
migrations.name: exclude-jest-config-from-ts-config

migrations.description: Update jest configs to support jest 28 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest28#configuration-options)
migrations.name: update-configs-jest-28

migrations.description: Update jest test files to support jest 28 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest28)
migrations.name: update-tests-jest-28

migrations.description: Stop hashing jest spec files and config files for build targets and dependent tasks
migrations.name: add-jest-inputs

migrations.description: Update jest configs to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-configs-jest-29

migrations.description: Update jest test files to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-tests-jest-29

migrations.description: Install the required angular-devkit packages as we do not directly depend on them anymore
migrations.name: install-required-packages

migrations.description: Remove 'showCircularDependencies' option from browser and server executors.
migrations.name: remove-show-circular-dependencies-option

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version

migrations.description: Remove 'package.json' files from library projects secondary entrypoints.
migrations.name: update-libraries-secondary-entrypoints

migrations.description: Update postinstall script running ngcc to use ES2020 target.
migrations.name: update-postinstall-script-ngcc-target

migrations.description: Update TypeScript compilation target to 'ES2020'.
migrations.name: update-tsconfig-target

migrations.description: Update `initialNavigation: 'enabled'` to `initialNavigation: 'enabledBlocking'`.
migrations.name: update-router-initial-navigation

migrations.description: Update any references of MFE to MF.
migrations.name: migrate-mfe-to-mf

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~14.1.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-14-1-0

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~14.2.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-14-2-0

migrations.description: Rename @nrwl/angular:webpack-server executor to @nrwl/angular:webpack-dev-server
migrations.name: rename-webpack-server-executor

migrations.description: Update the usages of @nrwl/angular/testing to import jasmine-marbles symbols from jasmine-marbles itself.
migrations.name: switch-to-jasmine-marbles

migrations.description: Stop hashing karma spec files and config files for build targets and dependent tasks
migrations.name: add-karma-inputs

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~15.0.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-15-0-0

migrations.description: Remove browserslist config as it's handled by build-angular
migrations.name: remove-browserlist-config

migrations.description: Update typescript target to ES2022
migrations.name: update-typescript-target

migrations.description: Remove bundleDependencies from server targets
migrations.name: update-workspace-config

migrations.description: Remove exported `@angular/platform-server` `renderModule` method. The `renderModule` method is now exported by the Angular CLI.
migrations.name: update-platform-server-exports

migrations.description: Remove no longer needed require calls in Karma builder main file.
migrations.name: update-karma-main-file

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~15.1.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-15-1-0

migrations.description: Update the @angular/cli package version to ~15.2.0.
migrations.name: update-angular-cli-version-15-2-0

migrations.description: Update the tsconfig.spec.json to use target es2016 for jest-preset-angular v13
migrations.name: update-tsconfig-spec-jest

migrations.description: Update the file-server executor to use @nrwl/web:file-server
migrations.name: update-file-server-executor

migrations.description: Update usages of webpack executors to @nrwl/webpack
migrations.name: update-webpack-executor

migrations.description: Adds @swc/core and @swc-node as a dev dep if you are using them
migrations.name: add-swc-deps

migrations.description: Adds @swc/core and @swc-node as a dev dep if you are using them (repeated due to prior mistake)
migrations.name: add-swc-deps-again

migrations.description: Adds @typescript-eslint/utils as a dev dep
migrations.name: experimental-to-utils-deps

migrations.description: Switch from  @typescript-eslint/experimental-utils to @typescript-eslint/utils in all rules and rules.spec files
migrations.name: experimental-to-utils-rules

migrations.description: Stop hashing eslint config files for build targets and dependent tasks
migrations.name: add-eslint-inputs

migrations.description: Add node_modules to root eslint ignore
migrations.name: add-eslint-ignore

migrations.description: Since Angular v15, the `RouterLink` contains the logic of the `RouterLinkWithHref` directive. This migration replaces all `RouterLinkWithHref` references with `RouterLink`.
migrations.name: migration-v15-router-link-with-href

migrations.description: In Angular version 15, the deprecated `relativeLinkResolution` config parameter of the Router is removed. This migration removes all `relativeLinkResolution` fields from the Router config objects.
migrations.name: migration-v15-relative-link-resolution

migrations.description: Updates the Angular CDK to v15
migrations.name: migration-v15
